title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of drone strikes, with a total of 9 data points.
Overall Number of drone strikes has decreased over the Year
Number of drone strikes is rapidly increasing from 2011 to 2012, gradually decreasing from 2012 to 2014, rapidly increasing from 2014 to 2017, and lastly rapidly decreasing from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Number of drone strikes about 127.0 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Number of drone strikes about 8.0 was recorded at Year 2019
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of drone strikes, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2017.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2014.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2019.
